prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Division of Continuing Education, Director of Extension Programs, Accession #RG-16/4/1.771, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from the Division of Continuing Education, 1977 July 11.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the files of Andre C. de Parry as chair of the Education Committee of the Virginia Commission on the Status of Women.
